title: Damn it = Helvete ocksa
creator_credit: Lennart Gustafsson, Lisbeth Gabrielsson, Svenska filminstitutet and Kanalfilm
brief_description: An animated film without dialogue which shows the physical and emotional stresses experienced by a young man in a big city. Music by Dag Vag.
